name: Crazy Sub
overview: You are a pearl diver and you have to pick up all the pears you can get but only if you dive in the unfathomed deep will you find the most wonderful ones. In your way you will find the most awful sea monsters. Based on the same type-in programming book that the game Dive is, "Commodore 64 - Fun and Games" but modified enough to sell as a new game in the Italian market.
